name: Kelly Bradfield
text: Good stuff we did order the meal deals but did Howies stuffed bread, wings and the meat eaters it was great.

name: Charles Mitchener
text: Having never tried Hungry Howie's before, we opted to go with the simplistic approach and just order a large cheese pizza with garlic and herb seasoned crust. The pizza was to our surprise, very good. The crust was a bit thin for "hand …More

name: Craig Fritz
text: Love the flavored crusts, really good pizza,  very Reasonably Priced

name: Austin Van Iwaarden
text: Hungry Howies in Allendale is the best pizza place in all of Allendale. The prices/deals, the staff, the service all of it combined equals one satisfying ordering experience. …More

name: Justin Broschk
text: The online ordering system is completely messed up, they will automatically stem your order for carryout with no email or any notice. I'm not even mad I'm disappointed

name: Mary Wright
text: First time we visited went there as my boyfriend saw an ad on tv for one of there subs he loved it and said he will go back. Thank you for your customer service

name: dymiva
text: Have ordered pizza and salads from this location, they are always reasonably priced and the order is usually ready early. Have never had a bad experience here.

name: Dimitri Jason
text: I've never been here before but I work near it so Google just assumes that I have. Enjoy the five stars pals. Homies. Folks.

name: Katie Wood
text: We really enjoy Hungry Howies and usually have good service. However, this is the third time that we've gotten home to find our pizza uncut. Not the biggest deal in the world but is rather annoying.

name: Sir Cerebral
text: The best Howies in west Michigan! Always in par with customer service, the food is never made improperly, the drivers never forget anything on my order! 11/10

name: Doug K
text: Great service. I always do carry out, so I don't know how delivery is, this is an excellent Hungry Howie's.

name: amanda rex
text: Best bread sticks ever! Asiago crust makes plain cheese delicious

name: Meta11ic Ice
text: Good pizza and quick service

name: Mitchell Smolen
text: Awesome pizza, good deals, fast service, and open late, all around a great pizza shop.

name: Michael Follett
text: 5 out of 16 orders from this store have been messed up, and it's always more than 1 item from my list that's missing. My last order they messed up 3 different things and I've received no response back. I don't trust them to accurately bring me what I ordered anymore. Order at your own risk.

name: Cora Kralevic
text: Love the flavored crust, yummy salads, fast delivery

name: Lee Garcia
text: Fast and friendly

name: Mrs. T
text: The service we received was fast and excellent!

name: Rich Retherford
text: They were rude and refused to deliver although they have in the past. Will not call them again

name: jodi potgeter
text: Pizza is ok. Nothing fancy

name: Jeremiah - THS
text: There's not much to say...it's HH's. My experience here is very limited, but have always had good service. Pizza and other options are what you'd expect from any franchise of the brand.

name: josh fedney
text: Good deals on decent pizza

name: Kevin Koetsier
text: Nothing special. Ok pizza with a flavored crust. There are better options in Allendale.

name: Xiaodan Zhang
text: First time to order pizza here. Love it!

name: Brian Degarmo
text: Good pizza

name: Robert Colorsmith
text: Awesome food. Fast delivery.

name: CyBer_BraydenFN
text: Great pizza

name: Christina Mohnke
text: Went in at 1130pm and the order was fresh and hot.

name: Janice Maxwell
text: Good!

name: Jacob Taylor
text: Taste great but aftermath sucks

name: Pete Ramos
text: Good pizza

name: Anton Dunst
text: My favorite cheap pizza joint

name: Blake Cremeans
text: HUGE good salads

name: Kenneth Haraburda
text: Food was delicious.

name: James Meekhof
text: Butter cheese crust, need I say more?

name: Amber Gauthier
text: Great delivery people!

name: Don Anton
text: Nothing special, but what you'd expect

name: Lisa Scheidel
text: Great bread stix

name: Nate Bol
text: our kids love it.
